info.name: Dark and Clean Userstyles
info.description: Part of my grander stylistic overhaul, makes a darker, cleaner, and simpler Userstyles.org for a better user experience.  Questions and comments are always welcome, future updates are inevitable as I use these styles myself, were anything to change or stick out, I would work on making an update to it for both you, and me.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

    Version 0.3

  • Fix new borders added to info boxes

    • Version 0.2

  • Blend raw CSS display

    • Version 0.1

  • Update borders

  • Add slight color mods.

Future Updates:

  • Update and color included source editor
